name: A To Do Application using polymer
desc: This is a progressive web application made using polymer and firebase. We have used polymer to create custom elements and used polymer element <firebase-element> to connect with the database in firebase. This application demos both the features of polymer and firebase showing we have endless possibities with these two techs.

name: Service Worker Demo
desc: This is a tryout for using service workers in our application showcasing the offline functionality. Using service workers we can actively respond to the users activity even the internet is slow or offline. One of the most desired functionality for web apps.

name: A polymer element <polymer-bg>
desc: polymer-bg A polymer element to evenly distribute the photos across rows or columns, making the most of the space provided.

name: <polymer-zoomove> Element
desc: <polymer-zoomove> A polymer element to use zoomove jquery plugin

name: <polymer-meter> Element
desc: <polymer-meter> This is a polymer element to indicate the amount of article still left for reading.
